exposuremode: Programmed AE, Shutter priority AE, Aperture priority AE, Manual exposure
continuousshooting: Up to 10 /JPEG, Up to 8 /RAW or RAW+JPEG, 5 / 3 fps selectable
focallength: f=23mm, equivalent to 35mm on a 35mm camera
lcdmonitor: 2.8-inch , approx. 460,000dots, TFT color LCD monitor (Approx. 100% coverage)
imagesensor: 23.6mm x 15.8mm (APS-C) CMOS with primary color filter
focusmode: Single AF / Continuous AF/MF Distance Indicator
digitalzoom: Approx. 6.3x (up to 31.5x when combined with optical zoom)
